PickDoneDate.description: Stored and displayed in warehouse time

PickTicketPrintDate.description: Stored and displayed in warehouse time

PackStarted.description: Set to True when the first package is created

PackDoneDate.description: Stored in server time, displayed in warehouse time

LoadOutDoneDate.description: Stored and displayed in warehouse time

WarehouseTransactionSourceType.description: how the transaction entered the system

oneOf.description: 0: unknown; 1: ui_manual; 2: ui_import; 3: automated_import; 4: external_soap_api; 5: quick_books_soap_api; 6: automated_system_charge; 7: rest_api

Status.description: 0: open (Has not yet been confirmed); 1: closed (Has been confirmed); 2: canceled (Has been canceled)

EstimatedQty.description: if present, calculated from SecondaryQty and cannot confirm until Qty entered

EstimatedSecondaryQty.description: if present, calculated from Qty and cannot confirm until SecondaryQty entered

OriginalPrimaryQty.description: on a shorted order, specifies original quantity ordered; otherwise same as Qty

IsOrderQtySecondary.description: if both Qty and SecondaryQty present, indicates whether at some point prior to shipping only SecondaryQty was present

Allocations.description: supplied on GET {get;set;} ignored on PUT, POST

Bin.description: supplied on GET, ignored on PUT, POST; use pick operations to set; cleared when shipped or packaged

ExternalId.description: connection of this order item to the same order item on some other system

Qty.description: primary inventory quantity ordered; if not specified, must specify SecondaryQty

SecondaryQty.description: optional secondary quantity ordered; if not specified, must specify Qty

LotNumber.description: if present, used to allocate matching inventory

SerialNumber.description: if present, used to allocate matching inventory

ExpirationDate.description: if present, used to allocate matching inventory

WeightImperial.description: ship weight of order item, imperial; if specified and metric not specified, business logic computes metric

WeightMetric.description: ship weight of order item, metric; if specified and imperial not specified, business logic computes imperial; see WeightImperial for further explanation

ProposedAllocations.description: empty on GET; may be supplied on PUT, POST

OrderItemInPackages.description: declares the package arrangement, which gets translated into real packages, during order creation; empty on GET; ignored on PUT; may be supplied on POST

PackageNumber.description: use the same number on multiple OrderItemInPackages to add package content to the same package

Quantity.description: how much of the orderitem to pack into this package content; must be a positive number

ExternalId.description: connection of this order to the same order on some other system

BillingCharges.description: PUT: set to NULL or empty to delete all charges

ChargeType.description: 1: handling; 2: storage; 3: prepaid_freight; 4: third_party_freight; 5: special_charges; 6: materials; 7: auto_calc_storage (used internally for sys-gen'ed charges); 8: auto_calc_handling (used internally for sys-gen'ed charges); 8: maxval (ignore, not a real value)

SameAs.description: PUT or POST: to use same Contact as another contact on the same order; GET: always null

RetailerId.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed from model: for ShipTo, use RetailerInfo; for SoldTo and BillTo, ignored

ContactId.description: for identifying: if known specify only this; other fields are ignored

Code.description: for identifying: if known specify only this; if other fields also specified it is not used to identify

SoldTo.description: in GETs: the contact; in POSTs or PUTs: identifies existing contact or properties of new contact

SameAs.description: PUT or POST: to use same Contact as another contact on the same order; GET: always null

RetailerId.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed from model: for ShipTo, use RetailerInfo; for SoldTo and BillTo, ignored

ContactId.description: for identifying: if known specify only this; other fields are ignored

Code.description: for identifying: if known specify only this; if other fields also specified it is not used to identify

BillTo.description: in GETs: the contact; in POSTs or PUTs: identifies existing contact or properties of new contact

SameAs.description: PUT or POST: to use same Contact as another contact on the same order; GET: always null

RetailerId.description: DEPRECATED, will be removed from model: for ShipTo, use RetailerInfo; for SoldTo and BillTo, ignored

ContactId.description: for identifying: if known specify only this; other fields are ignored

Code.description: for identifying: if known specify only this; if other fields also specified it is not used to identify
